CustomField.formula: IF(Registration_Type__c = "Car Wash", "If you have any questions regarding the above, please call (510) 285-3502 or email DLSELicensing@dir.ca.gov. ", IF(Registration_Type__c = "Talent", "If you have any questions regarding the above, please call (510) 285-3397, email DLSELicensing@dir.ca.gov, or fax requested item(s) to ", IF(Registration_Type__c = "Garment", "If you have any questions regarding the above, please call (510) 285-3398, email CPSLicensing@dir.ca.gov, or fax requested item(s) to ", IF(Registration_Type__c = "Child Performer Services", "If you do not respond, your application will be rejected and you will forfeit your application fee.", IF(Registration_Type__c = "FLC", "If you have any questions regarding the above, please call ", ""))))) + IF( AND( Registration_Type__c = "FLC", CONTAINS(Office__c, "Fresno")), "(559) 248-1893, email FLC@dir.ca.gov, or fax requested item(s) to ", "") + IF( AND( Registration_Type__c = "FLC", CONTAINS(Office__c, "Oakland")), "(510) 285-3399, email FLC@dir.ca.gov, or fax requested item(s) to ", "") /*+ IF(CONTAINS(Office__c, "Oakland"), "(510) 286-1366.", IF(CONTAINS(Office__c, "Fresno"), "(559) 248-1895.", "")*/
CustomField.label: Final Defect Text
